Headline: Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has has resumed and trains are moving with significant delays due to an earlier medical emergency at Logan Square.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has has resumed and trains are moving with significant delays due to an earlier medical emergency at Logan Square.

As a result of the delay:

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Grand and Jefferson Park, in both directions, and will conclude at 6:30 a.m.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
